description: PodAttachOptions is the query options to a Pod's remote attach call.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

stderr.description: This indicates whether stderr is to be redirected for the attach call.

stdin.description: This indicates whether stdin is to be redirected for the attach call.

stdout.description: This indicates whether stdout is to be redirected for the attach call.

tty.description: This indicates whether a TTY is to be allocated for the attach call.
